mapper.insert: insert into transBoard (write_no, category, n_id, title, content) values (transBoard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{category}, #{id}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update transBoard set viewCount = viewCount+1 where write_no = #{writeNo}
update transBoard set category = #{category}, n_id = #{id}, title = #{title}, content = #{content} where write_no = #{writeNo}
update transBoard set likes=likes+1 where write_no=#{writeNo}
